title: 35 of the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure, Climate and Nature Fund Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure,
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure, 

Climate and Nature Fund Act 2024 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited future ireland fund infrastructure climate nature fund act 2024 (commencement) (no 2) order 2024

title: 35 of the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure, Climate and Nature Fund Act
heading: 2. The 13th day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 13th day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 
35 of the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure, Climate and Nature Fund Act 
2024 (No. 16 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 September, 2024. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [454] 3
